snippet.title: Descent: Underground Status update
snippet.description: While we work our way through the court system, we thought we would show you the status of the game - currently we are very close to releasing to our Kickstarter backers and EA members as a Beta product, but we need to get through the court system to make that happen. Here is a link to the update: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/descendentstudios/descent-underground/posts/2954532
